alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Southern Meade Co Plains (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 05 at 2:11AM MST until February 05 at 5:00PM MST by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM THIS MORNING TO 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Harding County, Butte County, Perkins County, the Southern Meade County Plains and the Northern Meade County Plains. * WHEN...From 8 AM this morning to 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Sudden wind gusts can cause drivers to lose control, especially in lightweight or high profile vehicles. Strong winds can cause blowing dust, reduced visibility, and flying debris.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Butte; Harding; Northern Meade Co Plains; Perkins; Southern Meade Co Plains
